```
import file from './file'

// å®šä¹‰å‘½ä»¤ç±»å‹å¸¸é‡
const commands = {
  platform: {
    name: 'system-info',
    event: {
      platform: 'system-info-event'
    }
  },
  debug: {
    name: 'debug-data',
    event: {
      data: 'debug-data-event'
    }
  }
} as const

// å®šä¹‰å¹³å°ä¿¡æ¯æ¥å£
export interface PlatformInfo {
  platform: string
}

// å®šä¹‰è°ƒè¯•æ•°æ®æ¥å£
export interface DebugData {
  [key: string]: any
}

/**
 * å®¢æˆ·ç«¯API
 */
export class Client {
  /**
   * æ–‡ä»¶æ“ä½œ
   */
  static file = file

  /**
   * è·å–å¹³å°ä¿¡æ¯
   */
  static async platform(): Promise<PlatformInfo> {
    // å¦‚æœåœ¨webç¯å¢ƒä¸‹
    if (typeof window !== 'undefined' && !window.guiji) {
      return { platform: 'web' }
    }

    // å¦‚æœåœ¨å®¢æˆ·ç«¯ç¯å¢ƒä¸‹
    return new Promise<PlatformInfo>((resolve, reject) => {
      if (window.guiji) {
        try {
          // å‘é€è·å–ç³»ç»Ÿä¿¡æ¯çš„å‘½ä»¤
          window.guiji.send(commands.platform.name)
          // ç›‘å¬ç³»ç»Ÿä¿¡æ¯è¿”å›äº‹ä»¶
          window.guiji.receive(commands.platform.event.platform, (data: any) => {
            resolve(data as PlatformInfo)
          })
        } catch (e) {
          reject(e)
        }
      } else {
        resolve({ platform: 'web' })
      }
    })
  }
}

export default Client
```

```
const commands = {
  audio: {
    select: 'select-audio',
    event: {
      file: 'select-audio-file-event',
    },
  },
  video: {
    select: 'select-video',
    event: {
      file: 'select-video-file-event',
    },
  },
  file: {
    select: 'select-file',
    event: {
      file: 'select-file-event',
    },
  },
  open: {
    openFile: 'open-file',
    event: {
      result: 'open-file-result-event',
    },
  },
  saveAs: {
    saveFile: 'save-as-file',
    event: {
      result: 'save-as-file-result-event',
    },
  },
  save: {
    saveFile: 'save-file',
    event: {
      result: 'save-file-result-event',
    },
  },
} as const

/**
 * æ–‡ä»¶æ“ä½œ
 */
export default {
  /**
   * é€‰æ‹©éŸ³é¢‘æ–‡ä»¶
   */
  async selectAudio(option?: any): Promise<File | undefined> {
    return new Promise<File | undefined>((resolve) => {
      if (window.guiji) {
        window.guiji.send(commands.audio.select, option)
        window.guiji.receive(commands.audio.event.file, (data: any) => {
          if (data?.path && data?.name) {
            const file = new File([], data.name, {
              type: 'audio/mp3',
            })
            Object.defineProperty(file, 'path', {
              value: data.path,
              writable: false,
            })
            resolve(file)
          } else {
            resolve(undefined)
          }
        })
      } else {
        const input = document.createElement('input')
        input.type = 'file'
        input.accept = 'audio/*'
        input.onchange = () => {
          resolve(input.files?.[0])
        }
        input.click()
      }
    })
  },

  /**
   * é€‰æ‹©è§†é¢‘æ–‡ä»¶
   */
  async selectVideo(option?: any): Promise<File | undefined> {
    // å®ç°ä¸selectAudioç±»ä¼¼ï¼Œåªæ˜¯ä¿®æ”¹äº†æ¥å—çš„æ–‡ä»¶ç±»å‹
    // ...
    return undefined
  },
}
```

```
  {
    path: '/',
    name: 'home',
    component: () => import('../views/home/index.vue')
  },
  {
    path: '/voice-management',
    name: 'voice-management',
    component: () => import('../views/voice-management/index.vue')
  },
  {
    path: '/video-edit/:id?',
    name: 'video-edit',
    component: () => import('../views/video-edit/index.vue')
  },
  {
    path: '/:pathMatch(.*)*',
    name: 'not-found',
    redirect: '/'
  }
]

 * åˆ›å»ºè·¯ç”±å®ä¾‹

  routes
})

export default router
```

```
/**
 * åº”ç”¨å…¨å±€çŠ¶æ€ç®¡ç†
 * @module stores/modules/app
 */

import { defineStore } from 'pinia'
import { ref } from 'vue'
import { Client } from '@renderer/client'

// å®šä¹‰platformç±»å‹
type Platform = 'mac' | 'windows' | 'linux' | 'web'

/**
 * åº”ç”¨å…¨å±€çŠ¶æ€
 */
export const useAppStore = defineStore('app', () => {
  // å¹³å°ç±»å‹
  const platform = ref<Platform>('web')

  // åˆå§‹åŒ–å¹³å°ä¿¡æ¯
  const initPlatform = async () => {
    try {
      const result = await Client.platform()
      platform.value = result.platform as Platform
    } catch (err) {
      console.error('è·å–å¹³å°ä¿¡æ¯å¤±è´¥', err)
    }
  }

  return { platform, initPlatform }
})
```

+ ## 7. å›½é™…åŒ–æ–¹æ¡ˆåˆ†æ

+ ### å½“å‰å®ç°

+ æ”¯æŒä¸‰ç§è¯­è¨€:
+ - è‹±æ–‡(en)
+ - ç®€ä½“ä¸­æ–‡(zh-CN)
+ - ç¹ä½“ä¸­æ–‡(zh-HK)
+ 
+ **è¯„ä¼°**:
+ - âœ… ä½¿ç”¨æˆç†Ÿçš„å›½é™…åŒ–åº“
+ - âœ… æ”¯æŒå¤šç§è¯­è¨€

+ - âŒ å…¨é‡åŠ è½½è¯­è¨€åŒ…å¯èƒ½å½±å“æ€§èƒ½
+ 
+ ### æ”¹è¿›å»ºè®®
+ 
+ 1. **å®ç°è¯­è¨€åŠ¨æ€åˆ‡æ¢**:
+    ```javascript
+    // stores/modules/i18n.js
+    import { defineStore } from 'pinia'
+    import i18n from '@/i18n'
+    
+    export const useI18nStore = defineStore('i18n', () => {
+      // ä½¿ç”¨localStorageä¿å­˜ç”¨æˆ·è¯­è¨€åå¥½
+      const locale = ref(localStorage.getItem('locale') || 'zh-CN')
+      
+      const setLocale = (lang) => {
+        locale.value = lang
+        i18n.global.locale.value = lang
+        localStorage.setItem('locale', lang)
+        // æ›´æ–°document.documentElementçš„langå±æ€§
+        document.documentElement.lang = lang
+      }
+      
+      // åˆå§‹åŒ–
+      const detectLocale = () => {
+        // å¦‚æœç”¨æˆ·æœªè®¾ç½®ï¼Œå°è¯•ä½¿ç”¨æµè§ˆå™¨è¯­è¨€
+        if (!localStorage.getItem('locale')) {
+          const browserLang = navigator.language
+          if (Object.values(SupportLocale).includes(browserLang)) {
+            setLocale(browserLang)
+          }
+        }
+      }
+      
+      return { locale, setLocale, detectLocale }
+    })
+    ```
+ 
+ 2. **æ·»åŠ æ•°å­—å’Œæ—¥æœŸæ ¼å¼åŒ–**:

+      fallbackLocale: SupportLocale.EN,

+        'en': {
+          currency: {
+            style: 'currency',
+            currency: 'USD'
+          }
+        },
+        'zh-CN': {
+          currency: {
+            style: 'currency',
+            currency: 'CNY'
+          }
+        }
+      },
+      datetimeFormats: {
+        'en': {
+          short: {
+            year: 'numeric',

+    })
+    ```

+ 3. **å®ç°æŒ‰éœ€åŠ è½½è¯­è¨€åŒ…**:
+    ```javascript

+    import { createI18n } from 'vue-i18n'

+    const i18n = createI18n({
+      legacy: false,

+      messages: {
+        'zh-CN': {} // å…ˆåŠ è½½é»˜è®¤è¯­è¨€
+      }
+    })
+    
+    // åŠ¨æ€åŠ è½½å…¶ä»–è¯­è¨€
+    export async function loadLanguageAsync(lang) {
+      if (i18n.global.availableLocales.includes(lang)) {
+        i18n.global.locale.value = lang
+        return
+      }
+      
+      // åŠ¨æ€å¯¼å…¥è¯­è¨€åŒ…

+      i18n.global.setLocaleMessage(lang, messages.default)

+    }
+    ```

+ ## ç»“è®ºä¸ä¼˜å…ˆçº§å»ºè®®

```css
  .form-input:focus {
    @apply outline-none ring-2 ring-offset-0;
    border-color: var(--color-primary);
    ring-color: var(--color-primary-light);
  }
  
  .form-input:hover {
    border-color: var(--color-primary-light);
  }
  
  .form-hint {
    @apply mt-1 text-sm;
    color: var(--color-text-light);
  }
  
  /* å¡ç‰‡ */
  .card-container {
    container-type: inline-size;
    @apply grid gap-4;
    grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(280px, 1fr));
  }
  
  .card {
    @apply rounded-lg overflow-hidden transition-all duration-300;
    background-color: var(--color-background);
    border: 1px solid var(--color-border);
    box-shadow: var(--shadow-sm);
  }
  
  .card:hover {
    box-shadow: var(--shadow-md);
    transform: translateY(-2px);
  }
  
  .card-header {
    @apply p-4 border-b;
    border-color: var(--color-border);
  }
  
  .card-body {
    @apply p-4;
  }
  
  .card-footer {
    @apply p-4 border-t;
    border-color: var(--color-border);
  }
  
  /* å¿…å¡«æ ‡è®° */
  .required {
    @apply text-red-500 mr-1;
  }
}

/* æ·±è‰²æ¨¡å¼åˆ‡æ¢åŠ¨æ•ˆ */
body {
  transition: background-color var(--transition-normal), color var(--transition-normal);
}

.dark-mode-transition * {
  transition-property: background-color, border-color, color, fill, stroke;
  transition-duration: var(--transition-normal);
}
```

### 2. åˆ›å»ºæ·±è‰²æ¨¡å¼åˆ‡æ¢ç»„ä»¶

åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªæ–°æ–‡ä»¶ `src/components/ThemeToggle.vue`:

```vue
<template>
  <button 
    @click="toggleDarkMode" 
    class="theme-toggle"
    aria-label="åˆ‡æ¢æ·±è‰²æ¨¡å¼"
    :aria-pressed="isDarkMode"
  >
    <span class="sr-only">åˆ‡æ¢æ·±è‰²æ¨¡å¼</span>
    <svg 
      v-if="isDarkMode" 
      class="h-5 w-5" 
      xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" 
      fill="none" 
      viewBox="0 0 24 24" 
      stroke="currentColor"
    >
      <path 
        stroke-linecap="round" 
        stroke-linejoin="round" 
        stroke-width="2" 
        d="M12 3v1m0 16v1m9-9h-1M4 12H3m15.364 6.364l-.707-.707M6.343 6.343l-.707-.707m12.728 0l-.707.707M6.343 17.657l-.707.707M16 12a4 4 0 11-8 0 4 4 0 018 0z" 
      />
    </svg>
    <svg 
      v-else 
      class="h-5 w-5" 
      xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" 
      fill="none" 
      viewBox="0 0 24 24" 
      stroke="currentColor"
    >
      <path 
        stroke-linecap="round" 
        stroke-linejoin="round" 
        stroke-width="2" 
        d="M20.354 15.354A9 9 0 018.646 3.646 9.003 9.003 0 0012 21a9.003 9.003 0 008.354-5.646z" 
      />
    </svg>
  </button>
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
import { ref, watch, onMounted } from 'vue';
import { useAppStore } from '@renderer/stores/modules/app';

const appStore = useAppStore();
const isDarkMode = ref(false);

// åˆå§‹åŒ–ä¸»é¢˜
onMounted(() => {
  // ä»localStorageè¯»å–ä¸»é¢˜è®¾ç½®ï¼Œå¦‚æœæ²¡æœ‰åˆ™æ ¹æ®ç³»ç»Ÿä¸»é¢˜è®¾ç½®
  const storedTheme = localStorage.getItem('theme');
  const prefersDark = window.matchMedia('(prefers-color-scheme: dark)').matches;
  
  if (storedTheme === 'dark' || (!storedTheme && prefersDark)) {
    isDarkMode.value = true;
    document.documentElement.classList.add('dark');
    document.documentElement.classList.add('dark-mode-transition');
  }
});

// åˆ‡æ¢æ·±è‰²æ¨¡å¼
const toggleDarkMode = () => {
  isDarkMode.value = !isDarkMode.value;
  
  // åº”ç”¨è¿‡æ¸¡æ•ˆæœ
  document.documentElement.classList.add('dark-mode-transition');
  
  if (isDarkMode.value) {
    document.documentElement.classList.add('dark');
    localStorage.setItem('theme', 'dark');
  } else {
    document.documentElement.classList.remove('dark');
    localStorage.setItem('theme', 'light');
  }
  
  // 300msåç§»é™¤è¿‡æ¸¡ç±»ä»¥é¿å…å…¶ä»–æ“ä½œäº§ç”Ÿè¿‡æ¸¡æ•ˆæœ
  setTimeout(() => {
    document.documentElement.classList.remove('dark-mode-transition');
  }, 300);
};

// ç›‘å¬ç³»ç»Ÿä¸»é¢˜å˜åŒ–
onMounted(() => {
  const mediaQuery = window.matchMedia('(prefers-color-scheme: dark)');
  const handleChange = (e: MediaQueryListEvent) => {
    if (localStorage.getItem('theme') === null) {
      isDarkMode.value = e.matches;
      if (e.matches) {
        document.documentElement.classList.add('dark');
      } else {
        document.documentElement.classList.remove('dark');
      }
    }
  };
  
  if (mediaQuery.addEventListener) {
    mediaQuery.addEventListener('change', handleChange);
  }
});
</script>

<style scoped>
.theme-toggle {
  @apply p-2 rounded-full focus:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 transition-colors;
  color: var(--color-text);
  background-color: var(--color-background-alt);
}

.theme-toggle:hover {
  @apply bg-gray-200 dark:bg-gray-700;
}

.sr-only {
  @apply absolute w-px h-px p-0 -m-px overflow-hidden border-0;
  clip: rect(0, 0, 0, 0);
}
</style>
```

### 3. åˆ›å»ºè¡¨å•ç»„ä»¶åº“

åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªæ–°æ–‡ä»¶ `src/components/ui/FormInput.vue`:

```vue
<template>
  <div class="form-group">
    <label :for="id" class="form-label" v-if="label">
      <span v-if="required" class="required">*</span>
      {{ label }}
    </label>
    <div class="input-wrapper">
      <input 
        :id="id" 
        :type="type" 
        class="form-input" 
        :value="modelValue"
        @input="updateValue" 
        :placeholder="placeholder" 
        :aria-required="required ? 'true' : undefined"
        :aria-describedby="hint ? `${id}-hint` : undefined"
        :aria-invalid="hasError ? 'true' : undefined"
        :disabled="disabled"
      />
      <div class="input-icon" v-if="$slots.icon">
        <slot name="icon"></slot>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div :id="`${id}-hint`" class="form-hint" v-if="hint">{{ hint }}</div>
    <div class="form-error" v-if="hasError">{{ error }}</div>
  </div>
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
import { computed } from 'vue';

const props = defineProps({
  modelValue: {
    type: [String, Number],
    default: ''
  },
  id: {
    type: String,
    required: true
  },
  label: {
    type: String,
    default: ''
  },
  placeholder: {
    type: String,
    default: ''
  },
  type: {
    type: String,
    default: 'text'
  },
  required: {
    type: Boolean,
    default: false
  },
  hint: {
    type: String,
    default: ''
  },
  error: {
    type: String,
    default: ''
  },
  disabled: {
    type: Boolean,
    default: false
  }
});

const emit = defineEmits(['update:modelValue']);

const hasError = computed(() => !!props.error);

const updateValue = (event: Event) => {
  const target = event.target as HTMLInputElement;
  emit('update:modelValue', target.value);
};
</script>

<style scoped>
.input-wrapper {
  @apply relative flex items-center;
}

.input-icon {
  @apply absolute right-3 text-gray-400;
}

.form-error {
  @apply mt-1 text-sm text-red-600 dark:text-red-400;
}

/* ç„¦ç‚¹çŠ¶æ€å¢å¼º */
.form-input:focus-visible {
  @apply ring-2 ring-offset-0 outline-none;
  border-color: var(--color-primary);
  ring-color: var(--color-primary-light);
}

/* ç¦ç”¨çŠ¶æ€ */
.form-input:disabled {
  @apply bg-gray-100 dark:bg-gray-800 cursor-not-allowed;
  opacity: 0.7;
}

/* é”™è¯¯çŠ¶æ€ */
.form-input[aria-invalid="true"] {
  @apply border-red-500 dark:border-red-400;
}

.form-input[aria-invalid="true"]:focus {
  @apply ring-red-300 dark:ring-red-700;
}
</style>
```

### 4. åˆ›å»ºæ–°ç‰ˆå¡ç‰‡ç»„ä»¶

```vue
<template>
  <div 
    class="card" 
    :class="[
      elevated && 'card-elevated',
      clickable && 'card-clickable',
      compact && 'card-compact'
    ]"
    :data-card-type="type"
    :tabindex="clickable ? 0 : undefined"
    @click="clickable ? $emit('click') : undefined"
    @keydown.enter="clickable ? $emit('click') : undefined"
  >
    <div class="card-header" v-if="$slots.header">
      <slot name="header"></slot>
    </div>
    <div class="card-body">
      <slot></slot>
    </div>
    <div class="card-footer" v-if="$slots.footer">
      <slot name="footer"></slot>
    </div>
  </div>
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
defineProps({
  elevated: {
    type: Boolean,
    default: false
  },
  clickable: {
    type: Boolean,
    default: false
  },
  compact: {
    type: Boolean,
    default: false
  },
  type: {
    type: String,
    default: 'default'
  }
});

defineEmits(['click']);
</script>

<style scoped>

  box-shadow: var(--shadow-md);
}

  @apply cursor-pointer;
}

  @apply outline-none ring-2 ring-offset-2;
  ring-color: var(--color-primary);
}

/* ä½¿ç”¨Container Queryå®ç°å“åº”å¼å¸ƒå±€ */
@container (max-width: 480px) {
  .card-body {
    @apply p-3;
  }
  
  .card-header, .card-footer {
    @apply p-3;
  }
}

@container (min-width: 481px) {
  .card-body {
    @apply p-5;
  }

    @apply p-4;
  }
```

### 5. åˆ›å»ºæŒ‰é’®ç»„ä»¶

åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªæ–°æ–‡ä»¶ `src/components/ui/Button.vue`:

```vue
<template>
  <button
    class="btn"
    :class="[
      variant === 'secondary' && 'btn-secondary',
      variant === 'outline' && 'btn-outline',
      variant === 'text' && 'btn-text',
      size === 'sm' && 'btn-sm',
      size === 'lg' && 'btn-lg',
      fullWidth && 'btn-full',
      loading && 'btn-loading'
    ]"
    :disabled="disabled || loading"
    :aria-disabled="disabled || loading ? 'true' : undefined"
    :type="type"
    @click="$emit('click')"
  >
    <div class="btn-spinner" v-if="loading"></div>
    <span class="btn-content" :class="{ 'opacity-0': loading }">
      <slot></slot>
    </span>
  </button>
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
defineProps({
  variant: {
    type: String,
    default: 'primary',
    validator: (value: string) => ['primary', 'secondary', 'outline', 'text'].includes(value)
  },
  size: {
    type: String,
    default: 'md',
    validator: (value: string) => ['sm', 'md', 'lg'].includes(value)
  },
  type: {
    type: String,
    default: 'button',
    validator: (value: string) => ['button', 'submit', 'reset'].includes(value)
  },
  fullWidth: {
    type: Boolean,
    default: false
  },
  disabled: {
    type: Boolean,
    default: false
  },
  loading: {
    type: Boolean,
    default: false
  }
});

defineEmits(['click']);
</script>

<style scoped>
.btn {
  @apply relative inline-flex items-center justify-center rounded-md font-medium;
  background-color: var(--color-primary);
  color: white;
  padding: 0.5rem 1rem;
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
}

.btn:hover:not(:disabled) {
  background-color: var(--color-primary-dark);
}

.btn:focus-visible {
  @apply outline-none ring-2 ring-offset-2;
  ring-color: var(--color-primary-light);
}

.btn-secondary {
  @apply bg-gray-100 dark:bg-gray-800 text-gray-900 dark:text-white;
}

.btn-secondary:hover:not(:disabled) {
  @apply bg-gray-200 dark:bg-gray-700;
}

.btn-outline {
  @apply bg-transparent border;
  color: var(--color-primary);
  border-color: var(--color-primary);
}

.btn-outline:hover:not(:disabled) {
  @apply bg-blue-50 dark:bg-blue-900/20;
}

.btn-text {
  @apply bg-transparent;
  color: var(--color-primary);
}

.btn-text:hover:not(:disabled) {
  @apply bg-blue-50 dark:bg-blue-900/20;
}

.btn:disabled {
  @apply opacity-50 cursor-not-allowed;
}

.btn-sm {
  @apply text-sm px-2.5 py-1.5;
}

.btn-lg {
  @apply text-lg px-5 py-2.5;
}

.btn-full {
  @apply w-full;
}

.btn-loading {
  @apply relative;
}

.btn-spinner {
  @apply absolute inset-0 flex items-center justify-center;
  animation: spin 1s linear infinite;
}

.btn-spinner::before {
  content: '';
  @apply block w-4 h-4 rounded-full border-2 border-t-transparent border-white;
}

@keyframes spin {
  to {
    transform: rotate(360deg);
  }
}
</style>
```

### è®¾è®¡è¦æ±‚
1. **é£æ ¼ä¸è§„èŒƒ**ï¼šå‚è€ƒå…·æœ‰ç°ä»£ç®€çº¦é£æ ¼ã€ä»¥è“è‰²å’Œç™½è‰²ä¸ºä¸»è‰²è°ƒã€é‡‡ç”¨å¡ç‰‡å¼å¸ƒå±€å’Œç®€æ´å¯¼èˆªæ è®¾è®¡çš„ `ui_ux_design`ï¼Œé‡æ–°è®¾è®¡é¡¹ç›®çš„ UI ç•Œé¢ã€‚è¦æ±‚ç•Œé¢é«˜çº§æœ‰è´¨æ„Ÿï¼Œéµå®ˆè®¾è®¡è§„èŒƒï¼Œæ³¨é‡ UI ç»†èŠ‚ã€‚

### ç‰¹åˆ«è¦æ±‚

- **è¡¨å•å…ƒç´ æ— éšœç¢æ”¯æŒ**ï¼šä¸ºè¡¨å•å…ƒç´ æ·»åŠ æ— éšœç¢æ”¯æŒï¼ŒåŒ…æ‹¬ä¸ºè¾“å…¥æ¡†å’ŒæŒ‰é’®æ·»åŠ  `aria-label` å±æ€§ï¼Œæä¾›æ¸…æ™°çš„ç„¦ç‚¹æ ·å¼ï¼Œç¡®ä¿ç”¨æˆ·å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡é”®ç›˜è½»æ¾æ“ä½œè¡¨å•ã€‚

- **å•å…ƒæµ‹è¯•é€šè¿‡ç‡**ï¼šä¿æŒå•å…ƒæµ‹è¯•é€šè¿‡ç‡ 100%ï¼Œå½“å‰é¡¹ç›®ä½¿ç”¨ Jest è¿›è¡Œå•å…ƒæµ‹è¯•ï¼Œæ–°è®¾è®¡çš„ UI ä»£ç éœ€è¦ç¡®ä¿ä¸å½±å“ç°æœ‰çš„æµ‹è¯•ç”¨ä¾‹ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”å¯ä»¥æ·»åŠ æ–°çš„æµ‹è¯•ç”¨ä¾‹æ¥è¦†ç›–æ–°çš„ UI åŠŸèƒ½ã€‚

## 2. åˆ›å»ºæ·±è‰²æ¨¡å¼åˆ‡æ¢ç»„ä»¶

```diff
- 
+ <template>
+   <button 
+     @click="toggleDarkMode" 
+     class="theme-toggle"
+     aria-label="åˆ‡æ¢æ·±è‰²æ¨¡å¼"
+     :aria-pressed="isDarkMode"
+   >
+     <span class="sr-only">{{ isDarkMode ? 'åˆ‡æ¢åˆ°æµ…è‰²æ¨¡å¼' : 'åˆ‡æ¢åˆ°æ·±è‰²æ¨¡å¼' }}</span>
+     <!-- æœˆäº®å›¾æ ‡ (æ·±è‰²æ¨¡å¼) -->
+     <svg 
+       v-if="!isDarkMode" 
+       class="w-5 h-5" 
+       fill="none" 
+       stroke="currentColor" 
+       viewBox="0 0 24 24" 
+       xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
+     >
+       <path 
+         stroke-linecap="round" 
+         stroke-linejoin="round" 
+         stroke-width="2" 
+         d="M20.354 15.354A9 9 0 018.646 3.646 9.003 9.003 0 0012 21a9.003 9.003 0 008.354-5.646z" 
+       />
+     </svg>
+     <!-- å¤ªé˜³å›¾æ ‡ (æµ…è‰²æ¨¡å¼) -->
+     <svg 
+       v-else 
+       class="w-5 h-5" 
+       fill="none" 
+       stroke="currentColor" 
+       viewBox="0 0 24 24" 
+       xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
+     >
+       <path 
+         stroke-linecap="round" 
+         stroke-linejoin="round" 
+         stroke-width="2" 
+         d="M12 3v1m0 16v1m9-9h-1M4 12H3m15.364 6.364l-.707-.707M6.343 6.343l-.707-.707m12.728 0l-.707.707M6.343 17.657l-.707.707M16 12a4 4 0 11-8 0 4 4 0 018 0z" 
+       />
+     </svg>
+   </button>
+ </template>
+ 
+ <script setup lang="ts">
+ import { ref, watchEffect, onMounted } from 'vue';
+ 
+ const isDarkMode = ref(false);
+ 
+ // åˆå§‹åŒ–ä¸»é¢˜
+ onMounted(() => {
+   // æ£€æŸ¥æœ¬åœ°å­˜å‚¨ä¸­çš„ä¸»é¢˜è®¾ç½®
+   const savedTheme = localStorage.getItem('theme');
+   
+   // æ£€æŸ¥ç³»ç»Ÿåå¥½
+   const prefersDark = window.matchMedia('(prefers-color-scheme: dark)').matches;
+   
+   // è®¾ç½®åˆå§‹ä¸»é¢˜
+   if (savedTheme === 'dark' || (!savedTheme && prefersDark)) {
+     isDarkMode.value = true;
+     document.documentElement.classList.add('dark');
+   }
+ });
+ 
+ // åˆ‡æ¢æ·±è‰²æ¨¡å¼
+ const toggleDarkMode = () => {
+   // æ·»åŠ è¿‡æ¸¡ç±»
+   document.documentElement.classList.add('mode-transition');
+   
+   // åˆ‡æ¢ä¸»é¢˜
+   isDarkMode.value = !isDarkMode.value;
+   
+   if (isDarkMode.value) {
+     document.documentElement.classList.add('dark');
+     localStorage.setItem('theme', 'dark');
+     document.documentElement.classList.add('animate-theme-transition');
+   } else {
+     document.documentElement.classList.remove('dark');
+     localStorage.setItem('theme', 'light');
+     document.documentElement.classList.add('animate-theme-transition');
+   }
+   
+   // åŠ¨ç”»å®Œæˆåç§»é™¤è¿‡æ¸¡ç±»
+   setTimeout(() => {
+     document.documentElement.classList.remove('mode-transition');
+     document.documentElement.classList.remove('animate-theme-transition');
+   }, 300);
+ };
+ 
+ // ç›‘å¬ç³»ç»Ÿä¸»é¢˜å˜åŒ–
+ onMounted(() => {
+   const mediaQuery = window.matchMedia('(prefers-color-scheme: dark)');
+   
+   const handleChange = (e: MediaQueryListEvent) => {
+     // ä»…å½“ç”¨æˆ·æœªæ˜ç¡®è®¾ç½®ä¸»é¢˜æ—¶ï¼Œè·Ÿéšç³»ç»Ÿè®¾ç½®
+     if (!localStorage.getItem('theme')) {
+       isDarkMode.value = e.matches;
+       
+       if (e.matches) {
+         document.documentElement.classList.add('dark');
+       } else {
+         document.documentElement.classList.remove('dark');
+       }
+     }
+   };
+   
+   mediaQuery.addEventListener('change', handleChange);
+ });
+ </script>
+ 
+ <style scoped>
+ .theme-toggle {
+   @apply p-2 rounded-full transition-colors duration-300 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary-300;
+   color: var(--color-text);
+   background-color: var(--color-background-alt);
+ }
+ 
+ .theme-toggle:hover {
+   @apply bg-gray-200 dark:bg-gray-700;
+ }
+ 
+ .sr-only {
+   @apply absolute w-px h-px p-0 -m-px overflow-hidden;
+   clip: rect(0, 0, 0, 0);
+   white-space: nowrap;
+   border-width: 0;
+ }
+ </style> 
```

```diff
+ <template>
```

## 7. åˆ›å»ºæŒ‰é’®ç»„ä»¶

---

```diff
- 
+ <template>
+   <button
+     :type="type"
+     :class="[
+       'transition-all duration-200 inline-flex items-center justify-center font-medium rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-offset-2',
+       variantClasses,
+       sizeClasses,
+       loading ? 'relative' : '',
+       fullWidth ? 'w-full' : '',
+       disabled || loading ? 'opacity-60 cursor-not-allowed' : 'hover:shadow-sm',
+     ]"
+     :disabled="disabled || loading"
+     :aria-disabled="disabled || loading"
+     :aria-busy="loading"
+     @click="$emit('click', $event)"
+   >
+     <!-- åŠ è½½æŒ‡ç¤ºå™¨ -->
+     <div 
+       v-if="loading" 
+       class="absolute inset-0 flex items-center justify-center"
+       aria-hidden="true"
+     >
+       <svg 
+         class="animate-spin h-5 w-5"
+         :class="[
+           variant === 'primary' ? 'text-white' : 'text-primary-600 dark:text-primary-400'
+         ]" 
+         xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
+         fill="none"
+         viewBox="0 0 24 24"
+       >
+         <circle 
+           class="opacity-25" 
+           cx="12" 
+           cy="12" 
+           r="10" 
+           stroke="currentColor" 
+           stroke-width="4"
+         ></circle>
+         <path 
+           class="opacity-75" 
+           fill="currentColor" 
+           d="M4 12a8 8 0 018-8V0C5.373 0 0 5.373 0 12h4zm2 5.291A7.962 7.962 0 014 12H0c0 3.042 1.135 5.824 3 7.938l3-2.647z"
+         ></path>
+       </svg>
+     </div>
+     
+     <!-- å·¦ä¾§å›¾æ ‡ -->
+     <span v-if="$slots.icon && !loading" class="mr-2">
+       <slot name="icon"></slot>
+     </span>
+     
+     <!-- æŒ‰é’®å†…å®¹ -->
+     <span :class="{ 'opacity-0': loading }">
+       <slot></slot>
+     </span>
+     
+     <!-- å³ä¾§å›¾æ ‡ -->
+     <span v-if="$slots.iconRight && !loading" class="ml-2">
+       <slot name="iconRight"></slot>
+     </span>
+   </button>
+ </template>
+ 
+ <script setup lang="ts">
+ import { computed } from 'vue';
+ 
+ const props = defineProps({
+   variant: {
+     type: String,
+     default: 'primary',
+     validator: (value: string) => ['primary', 'secondary', 'outline', 'text'].includes(value)
+   },
+   size: {
+     type: String,
+     default: 'md',
+     validator: (value: string) => ['sm', 'md', 'lg'].includes(value)
+   },
+   type: {
+     type: String,
+     default: 'button',
+     validator: (value: string) => ['button', 'submit', 'reset'].includes(value)
+   },
+   disabled: {
+     type: Boolean,
+     default: false
+   },
+   loading: {
+     type: Boolean,
+     default: false
+   },
+   fullWidth: {
+     type: Boolean,
+     default: false
+   }
+ });
+ 
+ defineEmits(['click']);
+ 
+ const variantClasses = computed(() => {
+   switch (props.variant) {
+     case 'primary':
+       return 'bg-primary-600 text-white hover:bg-primary-700 focus:ring-primary-500 dark:bg-primary-700 dark:hover:bg-primary-600';
+     case 'secondary':
+       return 'bg-gray-100 text-gray-800 hover:bg-gray-200 focus:ring-gray-500 dark:bg-gray-700 dark:text-gray-100 dark:hover:bg-gray-600';
+     case 'outline':
+       return 'bg-transparent border border-primary-600 text-primary-600 hover:bg-primary-50 focus:ring-primary-500 dark:border-primary-400 dark:text-primary-400 dark:hover:bg-primary-900/20';
+     case 'text':
+       return 'bg-transparent text-primary-600 hover:bg-primary-50 focus:ring-primary-500 dark:text-primary-400 dark:hover:bg-primary-900/20';
+     default:
+       return '';
+   }
+ });
+ 
+ const sizeClasses = computed(() => {
+   switch (props.size) {
+     case 'sm':
+       return 'px-3 py-1.5 text-sm';
+     case 'md':
+       return 'px-4 py-2 text-base';
+     case 'lg':
+       return 'px-5 py-2.5 text-lg';
+     default:
+       return '';
+   }
+ });
+ </script> 
```

```diff
+ <template>

+   return '';
```

```diff
+             >
+               <svg v-if="!isPlaying" class="w-5 h-5" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 20 20">
+                 <path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M10 18a8 8 0 100-16 8 8 0 000 16zM9.555 7.168A1 1 0 008 8v4a1 1 0 001.555.832l3-2a1 1 0 000-1.664l-3-2z" clip-rule="evenodd" />
+               </svg>
+               <svg v-else class="w-5 h-5" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 20 20">
+                 <path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M18 10a8 8 0 11-16 0 8 8 0 0116 0zM7 8a1 1 0 012 0v4a1 1 0 11-2 0V8zm5-1a1 1 0 00-1 1v4a1 1 0 102 0V8a1 1 0 00-1-1z" clip-rule="evenodd" />
+               </svg>
+             </button>
+             
+             <div class="flex-1">
+               <div class="w-full h-2 bg-gray-200 dark:bg-gray-700 rounded-full overflow-hidden">
+                 <div 
+                   class="h-full bg-primary-600 dark:bg-primary-500 transition-all duration-100" 
+                   :style="`width: ${progress}%`"
+                 ></div>
+               </div>
+               <div class="flex justify-between text-xs text-gray-500 dark:text-gray-400 mt-1">
+                 <span>{{ formatTime(currentTime) }}</span>
+                 <span>{{ formatTime(duration) }}</span>
+               </div>
+             </div>
+           </div>
+         </div>
+       </div>
+       
+       <!-- æ–‡æœ¬å†…å®¹ -->
+       <div>
+         <h4 class="text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 dark:text-gray-300 mb-1">æ–‡æœ¬å†…å®¹:</h4>
+         <p 
+           class="text-sm text-gray-600 dark:text-gray-400 bg-gray-50 dark:bg-gray-800/50 p-3 rounded-md max-h-20 overflow-y-auto"
+           :class="{'italic text-gray-400 dark:text-gray-500': !voice.audioText}"
+         >
+           {{ voice.audioText || 'æ— æ–‡æœ¬å†…å®¹' }}
+         </p>
+       </div>
+     </div>
+     
+     <template #footer>
+       <div class="flex justify-end">
+         <Button 
+           variant="text" 
+           size="sm"
+           type="button"
+           @click="$emit('delete', voice)"
+           aria-label="åˆ é™¤éŸ³è‰²"
+         >
+           <template #icon>
+             <svg class="w-4 h-4" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24">
+               <path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M19 7l-.867 12.142A2 2 0 0116.138 21H7.862a2 2 0 01-1.995-1.858L5 7m5 4v6m4-6v6m1-10V4a1 1 0 00-1-1h-4a1 1 0 00-1 1v3M4 7h16" />
+             </svg>
+           </template>
+           åˆ é™¤
+         </Button>
+       </div>
+     </template>
+   </Card>
+ </template>
+ 
+ <script setup lang="ts">
+ import { ref, onUnmounted } from 'vue';
+ import { getAssetUrl } from '@/utils/url';
+ import dayjs from 'dayjs';
+ import { Card, Button } from '@/components/ui';
+ 
+ // å®šä¹‰éŸ³è‰²ç±»å‹
+ interface Voice {
+   id: string | number;
+   name: string;
+   audioPath: string;
+   audioText?: string;
+   createdAt: string | number | Date;
+ }
+ 
+ const props = defineProps<{
+   voice: Voice;
+ }>();
+ 
+ const emit = defineEmits(['delete']);
+ 
+ // éŸ³é¢‘æ’­æ”¾é€»è¾‘
+ const audioElement = ref<HTMLAudioElement | null>(null);
+ const isPlaying = ref(false);
+ const duration = ref(0);
+ const currentTime = ref(0);
+ const progress = ref(0);
+ 
+ const onAudioLoaded = () => {
+   if (audioElement.value) {
+     duration.value = audioElement.value.duration;
+   }
+ };
+ 
+ const onTimeUpdate = () => {
+   if (audioElement.value) {
+     currentTime.value = audioElement.value.currentTime;
+     progress.value = (currentTime.value / duration.value) * 100;
+   }
+ };
+ 
+ const togglePlay = () => {
+   if (!audioElement.value) return;
+   
+   if (isPlaying.value) {
+     audioElement.value.pause();
+   } else {
+     audioElement.value.play();
+   }
+   
+   isPlaying.value = !isPlaying.value;
+ };
+ 
+ // æ ¼å¼åŒ–æ—¶é—´ä¸ºåˆ†:ç§’
+ const formatTime = (seconds: number): string => {
+   if (isNaN(seconds)) return '0:00';
+   
+   const mins = Math.floor(seconds / 60);
+   const secs = Math.floor(seconds % 60);
+   return `${mins}:${secs.toString().padStart(2, '0')}`;
+ };
+ 
+ // æ ¼å¼åŒ–æ—¥æœŸ
+ const formatDate = (date: string | number | Date): string => {
+   return dayjs(date).format('YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm');
+ };
+ 
+ // æ¸…ç†èµ„æº
+ onUnmounted(() => {
+   if (audioElement.value) {
+     audioElement.value.pause();
+     audioElement.value.src = '';
+   }
+ });
+ </script>
+ 
+ <style scoped>
+ /* è‡ªå®šä¹‰éŸ³é¢‘æ»‘å—æ ·å¼ */
+ input[type="range"] {
+   @apply appearance-none bg-gray-200 dark:bg-gray-700 rounded-full h-2;
+ }
+ 
+ input[type="range"]::-webkit-slider-thumb {
+   @apply appearance-none w-3 h-3 rounded-full bg-primary-600 dark:bg-primary-400 cursor-pointer;
+ }
+ 
+ /* ä¿®å¤æ»šåŠ¨æ¡åœ¨æš—æ¨¡å¼ä¸‹çš„å¯¹æ¯”åº¦ */
+ ::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
+   @apply bg-gray-400 dark:bg-gray-600;
+ }
+ 
+ ::-webkit-scrollbar-track {
+   @apply bg-gray-100 dark:bg-gray-800;
+ }
+ </style> 
```
